verses.verse: Then <S%H227><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes, <S%H4294><s%> the leaders <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers' [households] of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to King <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to bring <S%H5927><s%> up the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> themselves to King <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> at the feast, <S%H2282><s%> in the month <S%H3391><s%> Ethanim, <S%H388><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>
Then all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> up the ark. <S%H727><s%>

And they brought <S%H5927><s%> up the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> utensils, <S%H3627><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in the tent, <S%H168><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> brought <S%H5927><s%> them up.

And King <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who were assembled <S%H3259><s%> to him, were with him before <S%H6440><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> sacrificing <S%H2076><s%> so <S%H7230><s%> many <S%H7230><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen <S%H1241><s%> they could not be counted <S%H5608><s%> or numbered. <S%H4487><s%>

Then the priests <S%H3548><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to its place, <S%H4725><s%> into the inner <S%H1687><s%> sanctuary <S%H1687><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> to the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place, <S%H6944><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the cherubim. <S%H3742><s%>

For the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> spread <S%H6566><s%> [their] wings <S%H3671><s%> over <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ark, <S%H727><s%> and the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> made <S%H5526><s%> a covering <S%H5526><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> and its poles <S%H905><s%> from above. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%>

But the poles <S%H905><s%> were so long <S%H748><s%> that the ends <S%H7218><s%> of the poles <S%H905><s%> could be seen <S%H7200><s%> from the holy <S%H6944><s%> place before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the inner <S%H1687><s%> sanctuary, <S%H1687><s%> but they could not be seen <S%H7200><s%> outside; <S%H2351><s%> they are there <S%H8033><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

There <S%H369><s%> was nothing <S%H369><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> except <S%H7534><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H5117><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> at Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> where <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when they came <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when the priests <S%H3548><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> from the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%>

so that the priests <S%H3548><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> for the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> that He would dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the thick <S%H6205><s%> cloud. <S%H6205><s%>
"I have surely <S%H1129><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Thee a lofty <S%H2073><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> A place <S%H4349><s%> for Thy dwelling <S%H3427><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>"

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> faced <S%H5437><s%> <S%H6440><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> while all <S%H3605><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was standing. <S%H5975><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with His mouth <S%H6310><s%> to my father David <S%H1><s%> and has fulfilled <S%H1732><s%> [it] with His hand, <S%H4390><s%> saying, <S%H3027><s%>

'Since <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought <S%H3318><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> I did not choose <S%H977><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> [in which] to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> that My name <S%H8034><s%> might be there, <S%H8033><s%> but I chose <S%H977><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> to be over <S%H5921><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>'

"Now it was in the heart <S%H3824><s%> of my father David <S%H1><s%> to build <S%H1732><s%> a house <S%H1129><s%> for the name <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord, <S%H8034><s%> the God <S%H3068><s%> of Israel. <S%H430><s%>

"But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to my father David, <S%H1><s%> 'Because <S%H1732><s%> <S%H3282><s%> it was in your heart <S%H834><s%> to build <S%H3824><s%> a house <S%H1129><s%> for My name, <S%H1004><s%> you did <S%H8034><s%> well <S%H2895><s%> that it was in your heart. <S%H2895><s%>

'Nevertheless <S%H7534><s%> you shall not build <S%H1129><s%> the house, <S%H1004><s%> but your son <S%H1121><s%> who shall be born <S%H3318><s%> <S%H2504><s%> to you, he shall build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> for My name. <S%H8034><s%>'

"Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has fulfilled <S%H6965><s%> His word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He spoke; <S%H1696><s%> for I have risen <S%H6965><s%> in place <S%H8478><s%> of my father David <S%H1><s%> and sit <S%H1732><s%> on the throne <S%H3427><s%> of Israel, <S%H3678><s%> as the Lord <S%H3478><s%> promised, <S%H3068><s%> and have built <S%H1696><s%> the house <S%H1129><s%> for the name <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord, <S%H8034><s%> the God <S%H3068><s%> of Israel. <S%H430><s%>

"And there <S%H8033><s%> I have set <S%H7760><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for the ark, <S%H727><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> is the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He made <S%H3772><s%> with our fathers when He brought <S%H1><s%> them from the land <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt. <S%H776><s%>"

Then Solomon <S%H8010><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the presence <S%H5048><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and spread <S%H6566><s%> out his hands <S%H3709><s%> toward heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> God <S%H430><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> Thee in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> or on earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> who art keeping <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and [showing] lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> to Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> who walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee with all <S%H3605><s%> their heart, <S%H3820><s%>

who <S%H834><s%> hast kept <S%H8104><s%> with Thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> my father David, <S%H1><s%> that which <S%H1732><s%> Thou hast promised <S%H834><s%> him; indeed, Thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> with Thy mouth <S%H1696><s%> and hast fulfilled <S%H6310><s%> it with Thy hand <S%H4390><s%> as it is this <S%H3027><s%> day. <S%H2088><s%>

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> with Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father that which <S%H1><s%> Thou hast promised <S%H834><s%> him, saying, <S%H1696><s%> 'You shall not lack <S%H559><s%> a man <S%H3772><s%> to sit <S%H376><s%> on the throne <S%H3427><s%> of Israel, <S%H3678><s%> if <S%H3478><s%> only <S%H518><s%> your sons <S%H7534><s%> take <S%H1121><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> to their way <S%H8104><s%> to walk <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H1980><s%> Me as you have walked. <S%H6440><s%>'

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, O God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> let Thy word, <S%H1697><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> Thee, be confirmed <S%H539><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> to Thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> my father David. <S%H1><s%>

"But will God <S%H430><s%> indeed <S%H552><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>? Behold, <S%H2009><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and the highest <S%H8064><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> contain <S%H3557><s%> Thee, how <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> less <S%H637><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have built! <S%H1129><s%>

"Yet have <S%H6437><s%> regard <S%H6437><s%> to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> and to his supplication, <S%H8467><s%> O Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> to listen <S%H8085><s%> to the cry <S%H7440><s%> and to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> prays <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee today; <S%H3117><s%>

that Thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> may be open <S%H6605><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> and day, <S%H3117><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast said, <S%H559><s%> 'My name <S%H8034><s%> shall be there, <S%H8033><s%>' to listen <S%H8085><s%> to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> shall pray <S%H6419><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>

"And listen <S%H8085><s%> to the supplication <S%H8467><s%> of Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> and of Thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when <S%H834><s%> they pray <S%H6419><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> Thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%> Thy dwelling <S%H3427><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> and forgive. <S%H5545><s%>

"If <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> sins <S%H2398><s%> against his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> and is made <S%H5377><s%> to take <S%H422><s%> an oath, <S%H423><s%> and he comes <S%H935><s%> [and] takes <S%H422><s%> an oath <S%H422><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thine altar <S%H4196><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%>

then hear <S%H8085><s%> Thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%> and act <S%H6213><s%> and judge <S%H8199><s%> Thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> condemning <S%H7561><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> by bringing <S%H5414><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> on his own head <S%H7218><s%> and justifying <S%H6663><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> by giving <S%H5414><s%> him according to his righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

"When Thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> are defeated <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> an enemy, <S%H340><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against Thee, if they turn <S%H7725><s%> to Thee again <S%H7725><s%> and confess <S%H3034><s%> Thy name <S%H8034><s%> and pray <S%H6419><s%> and make <S%H2603><s%> supplication <S%H2603><s%> to Thee in this <S%H2088><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%>

then hear <S%H8085><s%> Thou in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and forgive <S%H5545><s%> the sin <S%H9128><s%> of Thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and bring <S%H7725><s%> them back <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou didst give <S%H5414><s%> to their fathers.

"When the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are shut <S%H6113><s%> up and there is no <S%H3808><s%> rain, <S%H4306><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against Thee, and they pray <S%H6419><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> and confess <S%H3034><s%> Thy name <S%H8034><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> from their sin <S%H9128><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> Thou dost afflict <S%H6031><s%> them,

then hear <S%H8085><s%> Thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%> and forgive <S%H5545><s%> the sin <S%H9128><s%> of Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> and of Thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> indeed, <S%H3588><s%> teach <S%H3384><s%> them the good <S%H2896><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> they should walk. <S%H1980><s%> And send <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> on Thy land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> Thy people <S%H5971><s%> for an inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

"If <S%H3588><s%> there is famine <S%H7458><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> there is pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> there is blight <S%H9584><s%> [or] mildew, <S%H3420><s%> locust <S%H697><s%> [or] grasshopper, <S%H2625><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> their enemy <S%H340><s%> besieges <S%H9503><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> of their cities, <S%H8179><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> plague, <S%H5061><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> sickness <S%H9258><s%> there is,

whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> prayer <S%H8605><s%> or supplication <S%H8467><s%> is made <S%H1961><s%> by any <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> [or] by all <S%H3605><s%> Thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> each <S%H376><s%> knowing <S%H3045><s%> the affliction <S%H5061><s%> of his own heart, <S%H3824><s%> and spreading <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%>

then hear <S%H8085><s%> Thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%> Thy dwelling <S%H3427><s%> place, <S%H4349><s%> and forgive <S%H5545><s%> and act <S%H6213><s%> and render <S%H5414><s%> to each <S%H376><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> his ways, <S%H1870><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> Thou knowest, <S%H3045><s%> for Thou alone <S%H905><s%> dost know <S%H3045><s%> the hearts <S%H3824><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%>
that they may fear <S%H3372><s%> Thee all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> that they live <S%H2416><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> to our fathers.

"Also <S%H1571><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> the foreigner <S%H5237><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is not of Thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when he comes <S%H935><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%> for Thy name's sake <S%H4616><s%>

(for they will hear <S%H8085><s%> of Thy great <S%H1419><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> and Thy mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and of Thine outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>); when he comes <S%H935><s%> and prays <S%H6419><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%>

hear <S%H8085><s%> Thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%> Thy dwelling <S%H3427><s%> place, <S%H4349><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> for which <S%H834><s%> the foreigner <S%H5237><s%> calls <S%H7121><s%> to Thee, in order <S%H4616><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> Thy name, <S%H8034><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> Thee, as [do] Thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and that they may know <S%H3045><s%> that this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have built <S%H1129><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> by Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>
